bug_report.header: the selection of past date is allowed
bug_report.description: It is allowed to select a past date for ordering a call to the organization

steps_to_reproduce.step_3: Go to the form 'Select the day of the week'
steps_to_reproduce.step_4: In the calendar that opens, select any past date, for example: 11.01.2021
steps_to_reproduce.step_5: In the field 'Phone number' enter the number: '+7-999-999-99-99'
steps_to_reproduce.step_6: In the time selection form, in the 'From' radiobutton, select the value '09'
steps_to_reproduce.step_7: In the 'To' radio button, select the value '16'
steps_to_reproduce.step_8: Click on the 'Call me back' button

bug_report.actual_result: The page displays the message 'Thank you, we will call you back at the specified time' and the buttons 'Thank you' and 'Change call time'
bug_report.expected_result: A notification appears stating that an incorrect date has been selected. 'Call me back' button is not clickable
